price: 79. Oo qayb ka mid ah habeenka tuko tahajjud (salaatu leyl), salaad dheeri kuu ah aan faral ahayn. Waa intaasoo Rabbigaa kuu soo bixiyo meeqaan sharaf iyo ammaan leh (nolosha dambe ee Aakhiro,  waa shafeecada weyn ee Qiyaamada).
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَتَهَجَّدۡ بِهِۦ نَافِلَةٗ لَّكَ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَبۡعَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَامٗا مَّحۡمُودٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamina al-layli fatahajjad bihi nāfilatan laka ʿasā an yabʿathaka rabbuka maqāman maḥmūdan
